name: Garden Royale
description:
Garden Royale is a plant survival game I have created for Ludum Dare #46.

Battle against the heat, rain, and the ferocious snails and last as long as you can. If all of your plants die, the game is over.

The help them survive, collect the scraps on the level, and craft them into items at the workbench. Hints:
- Water the plants to keep their water level high,
- Kill snails with pesticide. Kill them as fast as you can, because they can reproduce.
- Protect plants from lightnings with a lightning rod.
- Shield the plants from stroms with an umbrella.

Disclaimer:
Unfortunately I had too many ideas for the game, and I couldn't finish the development proper. There is no sound, the art is ..well you can see it... and it is quite unbalanced. Sorry for that, I ran out of time. I hope you will enjoy it anyway.
